title: Asymmetric Phase Transfer Catalysis. Herausgegeben von Keiji Maruoka.
subject: General Medicine

items.abstract: <jats:p>Basic concept of phase-transfer catalysis (PTC), its field of applications and specific features as the most general, efficient, and environment-friendly green methodology of organic synthesis, particularly for industrial processes, is discussed.</jats:p>
